title: Spy osX v1.2 beta
description:
This is the now merely unreachable SpyX Beta application.

Its purpose is to run a little webserver dedicated to snapshot and live record of the user's desktop. It's not a VPN, just a kind of desktop webcam. You can broadcast what you're doing on your computer, along with some technical infos from your computer (RAM, iTunes playing, uptimes, etc...)

Totally useless so definetly useful :)

PS- I'm running it now. You can watch my DT at http://82.234.25.75:4242/

PPS- If someone know where I can find a tutorial or explanation how to set up a personnalised layout, please let me know!
